com.matrixone.apps.domain.util
Class BackgroundProcess

java.lang.Object
  com.matrixone.apps.domain.util.BackgroundProcess

public class BackgroundProcess
extends java.lang.Object

The BackgroundProcess class is used to carry out an action in a seperate thread

Version:
1.0 - Copyright (c) 2002, MatrixOne, Inc.

submit

public void submit(HttpSession session,
                   DomainObject object,
                   java.lang.String methodName,
                   java.lang.Object[] objectArray,
                   java.lang.Class[] objectTypeArray)
            throws FrameworkException
Starts the process as specified in methodName paraemeter in a new thread

Parameters:
context - the eMatrix Context object
objectArray - is an array of Objects that need to be passed to the given method in the given order, if null Context is passed
objectTypeArray - is an array of Class objects defining the objects in objectArray, if null Context class is used
session - is the user's HttpSession object
object - is the Object on which the method is invoked
methodName - is the name of the method to be invoked
Throws:
FrameworkException
Since:
AEF 9.5.3.0

submitJob

public void submitJob(Context context,
                      java.lang.String jponame,
                      java.lang.String methodName,
                      java.lang.String[] args,
                      java.lang.String jobId)
               throws FrameworkException
Creats a thread, and passes the thread to threadpool, which puts it in a queue where they get run in FIFO Idea here is to run "BackgroundProcess:invokeInBackground" in background thread, this methos in turn calls the JPO.invoke

Parameters:
context - the eMatrix Context object
jponame - - name of the JPO that needs to run in background
methodName - - method name on the JPO that needs to run in background
args - - arguments to the method on the JPO that needs to run in background
jobId - - Coresponding Job object ID for this background process
Throws:
FrameworkException
Since:
AEF 11.0

invokeInBackground

public void invokeInBackground(Context context,
                               java.lang.String jponame,
                               java.lang.String methodname,
                               java.lang.String[] args,
                               java.lang.String jobId)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
This method is invoked/run by the Background thread, using Java reflection mechanism

Parameters:
context - the eMatrix Context object
jponame - - name of the JPO that needs to run in background
methodName - - method name on the JPO that needs to run in background
args - - arguments to the method on the JPO that needs to run in background
jobId - - Coresponding Job object ID for this background process
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
Since:
AEF 11.0
